meta.title: A Day in Your Future Life | Life Path Story Cards - DopaBrain
meta.description: Experience a full day as your future self! 8 story moments from dawn to midnight reveal which of 8 life paths you're destined for.

app.title: A Day in Your Future
app.subtitle: Life Path Story Cards
app.heroDesc: Live through 8 moments of a day in your future life. Each choice you make — from sunrise to midnight — reveals the path you're destined for.
app.disclaimer: For entertainment only. Not a clinical assessment.

m1.scene: Golden morning light pours through floor-to-ceiling windows. Your alarm fades. It's the start of another day in your future life — 10 years from now.
m1.c1: Review today's packed schedule and map out priorities
m1.c2: Stretch slowly, brew coffee, and open my sketchbook
m1.c3: Lace up sneakers and head out for a sunrise run

m2.scene: Breakfast done. The city outside is waking up — cars humming, people heading to work. You step outside into crisp morning air.
m2.c1: To the office early — I like being the first one in
m2.c2: A cozy café with my laptop and noise-canceling headphones
m2.c3: The library, to dive into research I've been thinking about

m3.scene: You're deep in the flow. The morning is productive and energy is high. A colleague messages you about a new project opportunity.
m3.c1: Call a quick huddle — I have a bold vision for this
m3.c2: Block my calendar and dive into the creative challenge solo
m3.c3: Ask what they need help with — I'm here for the team

m4.scene: Lunchtime. You've been so focused you almost forgot to eat. The sun is high and warm outside, and the city buzzes with midday energy.
m4.c1: Meet an industry contact — great networking opportunity
m4.c2: Try that new hidden gem restaurant nobody's found yet
m4.c3: Grab something quick — I want to keep working on my idea

m5.scene: An unexpected problem lands on your desk. Something went wrong with a major project and people are looking to you for answers.
m5.c1: Take charge immediately — assign roles and rally everyone
m5.c2: Dig into the data to find the real root cause
m5.c3: Step outside for fresh air, then trust my instinct

m6.scene: Work is done. The sky is painted in orange and pink as the sun sets. You have the evening free to do whatever you want.
m6.c1: Hit the gym, then catch up on what's new in my field
m6.c2: Wander into an art gallery or catch a live music show
m6.c3: Host a small dinner party for close friends

m7.scene: The city glitters outside your window. The quiet hum of night settles in. You have a couple of hours before bed.
m7.prompt: How do you spend the night?
m7.c1: Tinker with a side project that's been on my mind
m7.c2: Have a long, deep conversation with someone I care about
m7.c3: Create content and share highlights of my day online

m8.scene: The world goes quiet. Stars peek through city lights. You're winding down, reflecting on a full day lived in your future life.
m8.c1: Plan tomorrow's goals and visualize what's next
m8.c2: Journal, meditate, and appreciate the small moments
m8.c3: Read a few chapters — always learning something new

ceo.name: 👔 CEO — The Leader
ceo.desc: Your future day reveals a born leader. You naturally take charge, plan strategically, and thrive under pressure. In 10 years, you'll be at the helm — guiding teams, making bold decisions, and building something extraordinary.
ceo.advice: Sharpen your listening skills. The greatest leaders amplify others' voices, not just their own.
ceo.quote: "The best way to predict the future is to create it." — Peter Drucker

artist.name: 🎨 Artist — The Creator
artist.desc: Your choices paint a picture of a creative soul. You're drawn to beauty, self-expression, and the quiet intensity of making something from nothing. In 10 years, your art will move people deeply.
artist.advice: Pair your creative fire with business sense. Great art deserves a great audience.
artist.quote: "Every artist was first an amateur." — Ralph Waldo Emerson

adventurer.name: 🧗 Adventurer — The Explorer
adventurer.desc: Your future self craves the unknown. You chose movement, spontaneity, and fresh experiences. In 10 years, you'll be living a life others only dream about — full of stories and hard-won wisdom.
adventurer.advice: Balance boldness with planning. The most legendary explorers always studied their maps first.
adventurer.quote: "Life begins at the end of your comfort zone." — Neale Donald Walsch

scholar.name: 📚 Scholar — The Thinker
scholar.desc: Your day reveals a mind that never stops seeking. You chose depth, analysis, and understanding at every turn. In 10 years, your knowledge will open doors others can't even see.
scholar.advice: Don't just study the world — engage with it. Knowledge shines brightest when shared.
scholar.quote: "The only true wisdom is knowing you know nothing." — Socrates

healer.name: 💚 Healer — The Caregiver
healer.desc: Empathy runs through every choice you made. You instinctively care for others and bring warmth wherever you go. In 10 years, you'll be the person everyone turns to — a steady, compassionate presence.
healer.advice: Protect your own energy first. You can't pour from an empty cup.
healer.quote: "The wound is the place where the Light enters you." — Rumi

influencer.name: ⭐ Influencer — The Connector
influencer.desc: You're a natural magnet. Your choices show someone who leads, connects, and inspires through sheer presence. In 10 years, your authentic voice will reach thousands and spark real change.
influencer.advice: Add depth beneath the surface. Authenticity outlasts virality every time.

inventor.name: 🔬 Inventor — The Innovator
inventor.desc: Your day is filled with tinkering, problem-solving, and building. You see solutions where others see obstacles. In 10 years, your innovations will change how people live, work, or think.
inventor.advice: Collaborate more. The greatest inventions happen when brilliant minds collide.
inventor.quote: "Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower." — Steve Jobs

freelancer.name: 🌊 Free Spirit — The Independent
freelancer.desc: Freedom is your north star. You chose flexibility, autonomy, and life on your own terms. In 10 years, you'll have designed a life that feels like vacation — not because it's easy, but because it's truly yours.
freelancer.advice: Build structure within freedom. Discipline is what makes liberty sustainable.
freelancer.quote: "Freedom is not the absence of commitments, but the ability to choose." — Paulo Coelho

share.twitterText: I lived a day in my future life and I'm destined to be: {type}! 🚀 What's your path?
